about_the_game:
Sugy the Christmas elf


It is Christmas time and the snowmen are revolting!

Christmas is near but the snowmen have kidnapped all reindeers. How can the presents reach the children nevertheless? Sugy is a clumsy Christmas elf whose job is to gift-wrap the pieces of coal for the naughty children. Sugy now, of all Christmas elves, wants to save the reindeers and bring them back to the North Pole. Will this go well?

In many mini games Sugy must prove his skills and his bravery to save Christmas.

Family-friendly game:

Due to the heart-warming story and the easy level of difficulty this game is appropiate for children, too.

Gameplay


  • sophisticated and new puzzles
  • no violence, suitable for children
  • varied maps in different climates
  • Playing time 2 - 3 hours
  • and many more…

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Sound Card: Compatible OpenGLR

name: Sugy the Christmas elf

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10/11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: It is Christmas time and the snowmen are revolting! Christmas is near but the snowmen have kidnapped all reindeers. How can the presents reach the children nevertheless? Save Christmas!
